job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p><strong>Requirements:</strong></p><ul><li>Ph.D/Masters/Bachelors degree in a quantitative field such as Mathematics, Physics, Finance, Engineering or Statistics</li><li>4 years of professional experience as a Data Scientist or related roles</li><li>Hands-on experience with Statistical Modeling/Machine Learning/Deep Learning techniques is must</li><li>Should be well-versed in programming languages of R/Python/SAS and be familiar with Deep Learning Frameworks like Tensorflow/Pytorch</li><li>Sound knowledge of financial instruments and financial risk/operational risk management principles is must</li><li>Ability to understand and implement techniques discussed in AI research papers (academic and technical)</li><li>Candidates must have any of financial certifications like CFA, FRM (at least level 1/part 1 should have been cleared)</li><li>MBA is not required but preferred</li></ul>
